Avatar.description: Dynamic binding of Avatar that contains image or image text to be displayed.

Avatars.description: Static binding of Avatar that contains image or image text to be displayed.

GridMax.description: Maximum number of avatars to be displayed in `AvatarGrid` including extra avatar counter.

ImageIsCircular.description: If the value is true, the image in grid is displayed in a circular shape. Otherwise, it will be a square.

BindingCollection.description: Definition of the BindingCollection to dynamically populate the collection. You can set this to binding/rule to return an array of data items. Note: If this is set to binding/rule, you must return an array of data items.
